name: update_news_data
description: Update the news data using this tool, this tool can be used to update the news data that you need from the web

file_name.description: Please pass the name of the file that you need to update

positive_news.description: Please pass a detailed positive analysis of the news data that you need to update

negative_news.description: Please pass a detailed negative analysis of the news data that you need to update

postive_news_sources.description: Please pass a detailed list of sources of the positive news that you need to update

negative_news_sources.description: Please pass a detailed list of sources of the negative news that you need to update
